attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, call on HM Government to support the United Nations Resolution drafted by the Federal Republic of Germany and the Federative Republic of Brazil in order to suppress electronic espionage. We, the British people, do not appreciate having our privacy stolen from us by the Government, and we do not appreciate having our privacy stolen from us by other Governments, including the Government of the United States of America.

This is a vital step in order to protect our democracy and protect our liberty.
